content: There will be a call tomorrow at our usual time - 1 tracker item, and a discussion of plans for Jan. connectathon (@Joee Garcia @Paul Lynch @Brian Postlethwaite )
There is a call today
There will be a Questionnaire call today - focus is rendering questionnaires in IGs
what time?
(and where are the coordinates for the call?)
@Lloyd McKenzie
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/Projects
I've submitted a PR with the 3 icon file changes.
https://github.com/FHIR/packages/pull/3

Hello!
Will there be a Questionnaire call today?
I would like to join and discuss issues I have created at jira.
Yes, there'll be a regular Questionnaire call today
Same coordinates as SDC? Unless I am too early / too late, I'm not able to connect.
Yes. It's the regular SDC call. 5 Eastern. Coordinates here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=40743450
thanks (I didn't remember my own time zone)
Due to lack of agenda items, I've cancelled today's questionnaire call. Sorry for the late notice.

There will be a call today. I wanted to discuss the possibility of a Questionnaire2 with the alternative approach to item.type and possibly also to enableWhen. Details here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/Projects
@Brian Postlethwaite @Paul Lynch

We will have a call tomorrow (Mar. 25 5:00 Eastern). I'd like us to revisit https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23765. To borrow one of Grahame's phrases, it has considerable "sting in the tail" and I'm not sure we want to proceed with it.

Did that call go ahead?
Looks like I've missed it thanks to the joys of different daylight savings clashes...
Yup. It was 5-6 Eastern, which is now an hour earlier
And your usual zulip/skype reminder message was absent too :sad:
Sorry :(
For discussion on our next call - revisiting FHIR#21378. It makes no sense to move this wording to core, given that core doesn't talk about Population at all. @Bas van den Heuvel

@Lloyd McKenzie, The population aspect is defined in SDC, I totally agree that we should not address that population related elements in core. The core specification does define the Questionnaire.derivedFrom field.

So that leads to the "core" related question: what does derivedFrom mean what is expected related behavior of this field?
We have no new issues to discuss, so I've cancelled today's call. We'll meet next week.
Have cancelled today's call - no new items.
Fine with me, but I thought I had submitted two items earlier this week.
@Lloyd McKenzie I hope you are able to see FHIR-31991 and FHIR-31992. They are nothing particularly important, and can certainly wait until next time.
Yeah, I figured they could wait until next week
There will be a call today
@Ilya Beda plans to join us, so we'll have a call today and try to land his items.
There will be a call tonight - to go over connectathon outcomes, review Ilya's proposal and some of the tracker items that came in this week.

Sorry for the late notice. Given that tomorrow is Canada day and my household has some activities planned I'm going to cancel the SDC Questionnaire call tomorrow. Feel free to continue the discussion on language translation on the relevant thread.
Call in this week?
yup

Hi!
Unfortunately, I can't make it this week. I will add more comments to the questionnaire translation stream.
Is there a call today? @Lloyd McKenzie
There was supposed to be, but I missed my reminder. At this point it's probably too late. Sorry everyone :(
[deleted]
Is there a call today? Is the Questionnaire call the same as the SDC call?
Yes and yes :)
Zoom details should be the same?
I'm getting meeting has not started
That's because it starts in 35 minutes... :)
Ah, I'm 1/2 hour early, not 1/2 hour late :wink:

The zoom client is too much for my laptop, apparently. I could not hear the audio clearly. How do I dial in? The information on hl7.org/concalls offers a phone number and a participant passcode, but when I dial in I get asked for a conference code, which I don't see.
Sorry Paul, just saw this. I don't know the answer. @Joshua Procious ?
Hello Paul, the meeting ID should be synonymous with Conference Code:
[Uploading image.pngâ€¦]()
@Joshua Procious Your image did not upload and I don't see anything at http://www.hl7.org/concalls/CallDetails.cfm?concall=55586 that refers to a "meeting ID".
image.png
Thank you for this ping. Apologies on the failed upload. You should see it in-line once you click on the details. Are you able to access that?
@Joshua Procious Here is what I see in that part of the page:
image.png
For some reason (perhaps due to privilege settings?) you can see more information that I can.
Are you logged in? If you are, I will investigate as to why you cannot see.

@Joshua Procious Yes, I am logged in. The page has my name in the upper right. Are you looking at http://www.hl7.org/concalls/CallDetails.cfm?concall=55586? The example image you posted was for a different meeting.
Hello Paul. Yes, I am seeing what you're saying. FHIR I Needs to add the information to that call page. I'll reach out. You should see it there once it's been updated.
@Lloyd McKenzie is there a call today?
Evidently, there is.... It just started.

For our call today, can I ask for a few minutes to talk about the scoring, aggregates and how they can interact with the ordinal values in codings.
(does anyone else already do this? @Paul Lynch @Stoyan Halkaliev @Ilya Beda ?)
